AC_Warmachine.Goblin_Support_Gold_0: A treasure chest filled with Gold.
AC_Warmachine.Goblin_Support_Gold_1: You open the box and find:
AC_Warmachine.Goblin_Support_Res_1: You come closer and inspect what the goblin found:
AC_Warmachine.Goblin_Support_Creature_0: I found some poor creatures that are willing to join us.
AC_Warmachine.Goblin_Support_Creature_1: Do you accept the creatures in your army:
AC_Warmachine.Goblin_Support_Exp_0: A scroll with old knowledge, maybe there is something valuable written on it.
AC_Warmachine.Goblin_Support_Exp_1: You take the scroll and read it.
AC_Warmachine.Goblin_Support_Artifact_0: Looks like an artifact, I found it buried in the ground.
AC_Warmachine.Goblin_Support_Artifact_1: This is indeed an artifact, you inspect it to find about the properties of the artifact:
AC_Warmachine.Goblin_Support_Spell_0: You take the spell scroll and read it.
AC_Warmachine.Goblin_Support_Spell_1: With the help of the scroll you are able to learn a new spell:
AC_Warmachine.Goblin_Support_Skill_0: A scroll with ancient knowledge. You should read it, my Master.
AC_Warmachine.Goblin_Support_Skill_1: You take the scroll and read it. It contains some tricks you did not know about:
AC_Warmachine.Champions_Honor_Set_WM:
{Champions Honor Set Bonus}

Your glory and fame are legendary all over the continent. A talented blacksmith approaches you and offers you the following upgrade for your Warmachines for free:
AC_Warmachine.Champions_Honor_Set_Skill:
{Champions Honor Set Bonus}

The power of the set grants you an additional primary skill point.
AC_Warmachine.Glyph_of_Gal_Creatures:
{Glyph of Gallantry}

On their search for glory a few {~Gold}@crname@{~} join @heroname@s army.
AC_Warmachine.Ammo_Cart_Extra_Descr:
Increases healing of First Aid tent after combat.
Increases Artillery/Eagle Eye damage before combat.
Gives +3 Spell Points after combat.
AC_Warmachine.Ammo_Cart_Extra_Descr2:
Increases healing of First Aid tent after combat.
Increases Artillery/Eagle Eye damage before combat.
Gives +3 Spell Points after combat.
AC_Warmachine.GEM_Button_Smith_Hint: Allows to buy upgrades for your Warmachines at the Blacksmith
AC_Warmachine.Treatment_HealUpgrAtt: The creature decided to upgrade its {~orange}attack by +1{~}
AC_Warmachine.Treatment_HealUpgrDef: The creature decided to upgrade its {~orange}defense by +1{~}
AC_Warmachine.Treatment_HealUpgrHP: The creature decided to upgrade its {~orange}health by +1{~}
AC_Warmachine.Treatment_HealUpgrDmg: The creature decided to upgrade its {~orange}damage by +1{~}
AC_Warmachine.Treatment_HealUpgrSpeed: The creature decided to upgrade its {~orange}speed by +1{~}

button.name: upgrsmth.def
button.hint: Allows to buy upgrades for your Warmachines at the Blacksmith

button.name: enchant.def
button.hint: Allows to buy enchantments for your Warmachines at the Mage Guild

errors.alreadyBought:
You have already bought this upgrade, moron!
I bet you would like me to upgrade your war machine to the next level, yes?

Give me {2000} Gold and come back in one week hehe
errors.cantAfford: You don't have enough resources to buy this upgrade
errors.cantLearn: You don't have enough knowledge in the required skills
errors.cantExpertise: You can only get one {~r}ultimate{~} upgrade from this master.
errors.cantAdvance:
Your hero has learned too many secondary skills. I don't like that.
Go somewhere else.

missedMachines.0: How about you first BUY a Ballista before I can start working on it... damn these stupid people nowadays.
missedMachines.1: How about you first BUY an Ammo Cart before I can start improving it... you are wasting my time here.
missedMachines.2: How about you first BUY a First Aid Tent before I can start upgrading it... I will now charge you double for the Upgrade.
missedMachines.3: You need to have ALL Warmachines bought before I can start upgrading them... makes sense doesn't it.

errors.noUpgrade: Well, you have to pick an upgrade to proceed, right?
errors.Next_Time: You don't want to upgrade? Why not? I'm like Donald Trump, nobody knows more about improving war machines than I do!

offers.Solid_Choice_1: Solid choice, I will make you a good price:
offers.Solid_Choice_2: Excellent choice, I will make you friendship price:
offers.Solid_Choice_3: I'm happy, my best offer, I will make you a special price
offers.0: Do you want to increase the upgrade level from @from@ to @to@?
offers.1: Are you still interested in buying this improvement?
offers.2: Are you manly enough to buy this upgrade?

dlg.ask: Do you want to increase the upgrade level from @from@ to @to@?

1.description:
{~r}@upgradeName@ Enchantment{~}


This powerful enchantment binds the hero's magic power to the Ballista. Damage caused by the Ballista provides a chance for a powerful spell of the hero to be cast on the target. The damage of the spells scale with your heroes spell power.

Chance to trigger: (15%)
Scaling: (20%) of hero Spell Power.

2.description:
{~r}@upgradeName@ level 2 Enchantment{~}


This powerful enchantment binds the hero's magic power to the Ballista. Damage caused by the Ballista provides a chance for a powerful spell of the hero to be cast on the target. The damage of the spells scale with your heroes spell power.

Chance to trigger: (20%)
Scaling: (25%) of hero Spell Power.

1.description:
{~r}@upgradeName@ Upgrade{~}


Flexible and modular design allows war machines to be set up and used even in confined battlefields such as creatures banks or ships.
